sentence.Network_en: A hula hoop can be spun around the body.
Grandma can shake the hula hoop for a long time.
sentence.Network_cn: 奶奶可以摇呼拉圈摇很久.

sentence.Network_en: Whichever team collects the most hula hoop at the end wins.
sentence.Network_cn: 收集到最多呼啦圈的队伍获胜.
